participant_1.name: Skylar
participant_1.personality: Creative and vibrant, always seeks fun and adventure.
participant_1.background: I like to dye my hair blue because it's fun and bright. I am a dog walker. I'm always making delicious French fries for my family. My father lives in China. My passion is photography.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and artistic, with a deep appreciation for creativity.
participant_2.background: I enjoy making clothing for my loved ones. I cherish my collection of Celtics memorabilia, but my most valued possession is my garden. I work in the emergency room. I've always loved to paint, but I don't think I could do it if I were blind. I like doing art projects.

content.text: I love to change my hair color a lot, right now it's blue!
Oh my goodness! That sounds like a lot of fun! What's your favorite color?
I really like bright colors! So that's why I do it.
Wow, I love that! Do you have any pictures of your hair?
Yes, I have a few on my phone. Let me show you!
Wow! Your hair is amazing! I love how blue it is!
Thank you so much! I love it too!
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a dog walker! I love it!
What kind of hobbies do you have?
I love photography, and I enjoy painting.
Wow! I love both of those things too!
Oh, that's so cool! We should be friends
